name: Recipe: Grainfruit Chips
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Grainfruit Chips.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Dish Effects</color>
Restores <color=#37ffff>18%–22%</color> of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates <color=#37ffff>300–470</color> HP every 5s for 30s.
<color=#ffffff>Proficiency</color>
10
<color=#ffffff>Dishes</color>

customize.name: Grainfruit Chips
customize.desc: Crispy triangular chips. After being scooped out of the oil-filled pot, the deep-fried chips are drizzled with sauce, sprinkled with cheese, and finally topped with shredded meat — thus is a hearty Natlan breakfast born.

customize.name: Delicious Grainfruit Chips
customize.desc: Crispy triangular chips. Crunch-crunch-crunch go the crispy pieces! You simply cannot stop pairing it with the sweet and sour sauce, the rich, fragrant cheese, the delicious shredded meat... Why does this combination have to. Be. So. Delicious?

customize.name: Suspicious Grainfruit Chips
customize.desc: Crispy triangular chips. The oily, crunchy pieces collide with sickly sticky cheese to create a greasy texture that can only be stomached once, but never again.

customize.name: Kachina
customize.desc: A young warrior of the Nanatzcayan, given the Ancient Name of "Uthabiti." Kind-hearted and insatiably persistent, she grows stronger and more capable with each setback she faces.

customize.name: Impeccably Organized
customize.desc: Kachina's specialty. The chips are arrayed in neat rows, fried just right. In their crunchy deliciousness, you can see Kachina's earnestness and care. Would it be too much motivation for her if you were to tell her how you felt about the dish, plus some compliments?

customize.name: Cipac
customize.desc: Merchant from the Stadium of the Sacred Flame.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Grainfruit Chips
customize.desc: Crispy triangular chips. After being scooped out of the oil-filled pot, the deep-fried chips are drizzled with sauce, sprinkled with cheese, and finally topped with shredded meat — thus is a hearty Natlan breakfast born.

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Cheese
customize.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

value.text: Purchase from Cipac at Hotel Debord in Court of Fontaine
